entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:25 PM PST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Revelstoke Airport 12:25 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of wet flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of wet flurries or rain showers near midnight. Fog. Low zero. Forecast issued 10:16 PM PST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of wet flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of wet flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Snow level near valley bottom. Fog dissipating late in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 10:16 PM PST Monday 16 January 2023
